description: This file implements the HttpClient class, responsible for handling HTTP file downloads using libcurl, including initialization, cleanup, progress tracking, and error handling.

classes.name: HttpClient
classes.description: A class that manages HTTP file download operations using libcurl, including rate limiting, progress updates, and error handling.

methods.name: HttpClient()
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the curl handle.

methods.name: ~HttpClient()
methods.description: Destructor that cleans up the curl handle.

methods.name: downloadFile(const std::string & url, const std::string & fileName, uint32_t rateLimit)
methods.description: Downloads a file from the specified URL and saves it to disk with an optional rate limit.

methods.name: progressCb(void *ptr, double dltotal, double dlnow, double ultotal, double ulnow)
methods.description: Static callback function to track download progress.

methods.name: write_data(void *ptr, size_t size, size_t nmemb, FILE *stream)
methods.description: Static callback function to write downloaded data to a file.

methods.name: HttpClient::Status downloadFile(const std::string & url,const std::string & fileName,uint32_t rateLimit)
methods.description: Performs the file download operation with progress and error handling.

methods.name: size_t progressCb(void * ptr,double dltotal,double dlnow,double ultotal,double ulnow)
methods.description: Tracks the download progress; updates the progress percentage.

methods.name: size_t write_data(void * ptr,size_t size,size_t nmemb,FILE * stream)
methods.description: Writes downloaded data to the specified file stream.

ctags.name: downloadFile
ctags.pattern: /^HttpClient::downloadFile(const std::string & url, const std::string & fileName, uint32_t rateLim/

ctags.name: progressCb
ctags.pattern: /^size_t HttpClient::progressCb(void *ptr, double dltotal, double dlnow, double ultotal, double ul/

ctags.name: write_data
ctags.pattern: /^size_t HttpClient::write_data(void *ptr, size_t size, size_t nmemb, FILE *stream) {$/
